intro:
How many world capitals can you name?
Challenge your “geography brain” with a 4-choice quiz!
description:
“Capital City Brain Training Quiz” is a fun four-choice game where you pick the correct capital and boost your geography skills.

From world-famous cities to more obscure countries, the questions cover a wide range.  
Answer at a steady pace and you’ll feel your memory and decision-making sharpen quickly.

“Wait… what’s the capital of this country again?”  
“It’s fun discovering places I didn’t even know!”

Play solo or with friends. It always gets lively.  
Perfect for quick breaks or as a learning tool.
